io.sphere.sdk.client

Interface BlockingSphereClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, SphereClient

    public interface BlockingSphereClient
extends SphereClient
    A client for commercetools which provides thread block and non-blocking methods to execute a request. The implementations should be thread-safe so they can be used by multiple threads in parallel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Shuts down the client to save resources like connections and threads.
      <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<T> execute(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest)
      Executes asynchronously a request to commercetools.
      <T> T executeBlocking(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest)
      Executes a request and blocks the caller thread until the response is available or a client specific timeout occurs.
      <T> T executeBlocking(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Executes a request and blocks the caller thread until the response is available or a request specific timeout occurs.
      static BlockingSphereClient of(SphereClient delegate, long defaultTimeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Creates a blocking client with a configured default timeout for blocking requests.

      • executeBlocking

        <T> T executeBlocking(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest)
        Executes a request and blocks the caller thread until the response is available or a client specific timeout occurs.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the result for the request

        Throws:

      • executeBlocking

        <T> T executeBlocking(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest,
                      long timeout,
                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Executes a request and blocks the caller thread until the response is available or a request specific timeout occurs.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the result for the request
        Parameters:
        sphereRequest - request to commercetools to perfom
        timeout - the maximum time to wait for this single request
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        result for the request to commercetools
        Throws:
        SphereTimeoutException - if a timeout occurs

      • of

        static BlockingSphereClient of(SphereClient delegate,
                               long defaultTimeout,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Creates a blocking client with a configured default timeout for blocking requests. The asynchronous calls won't have a timeout by default.
        Parameters:
        delegate - underlying sphere client which may be initialized with the SphereClientFactory.
        defaultTimeout - the default maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the defaultTimeout argument
        Returns:
        wrapped client which can perform blocking calls.
